Description: Just smelling it reminds me of my youth
It calms my heart and soothes my soul
You know, there are a lot of studies out there that report that these plants have more restorative properties than what Western Medicine understands
Some kind of pistol. Never seen one up close like this before...
Doesn't hold much for ammo, but I need to be careful around this weapon
Looks to fit a pistol I believe
Looks to be a shotgun shell. I wonder if I have to remove the Red Plastic before I try putting it in the gun...
